articles.title: More materials and relics displayed at war museum
U.S. bellicose forces' moves to block Korean independent reunification under firev
articles.content:
More materials and relics displayed at war museum 
    Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- More revolutionary historical materials and war relics have been displayed at the victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum in the DPRK. 
 They tell about the feats performed by the people's army and the people of Korea in the battles to defeat the u.s. imperialists.   
 Among those materials and relics are seven pictures of President Kim Il Sung who led the June 1950-July 1953 Fatherland Liberation War to victory. There are also over 50 exhibits including photographs and war relics which show the mass heroism and revolutionary optimism displayed by the Korean servicemen and people.

Korean people's cause of reunification supported by Pakistani President 
    Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Muhammad Rafiq Tarar, President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, supported the Korean people's cause of reunification when he met a DPRK government cultural delegation led by Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the committee for cultural relations with foreign countries, on March 18.
 He sincerely wished the DPRK progress and prosperity under the wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.    
 Saying that the Pakistani people rejoice over the achievements made by the Korean people in the struggle for national reunification, he wholeheartedly hoped Korea would be reunified independently without foreign interference.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il sends message of condolence to bereaved family of late Jong Ju Yong 
    Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Leader kim jong il sent a message of condolence yesterday to the bereaved family of the late Jong Ju Yong on his death.
 The message expressed deep condolences to the Hyundai Group and the bereaved family over the death of Jong Ju Yong who had contributed to reconciliation and cooperation between the north and south of Korea, the great unity of the nation and patriotic work for reunification.
